title: Train Simulator 2013 27.5a + DLC (35 GB in 8 GB dl)
description:
============================================================

Info
------------------------------------------------------------

This is Train Simulator 2013, version 27.5a with lots of DLC
obtained from http://pirateproxy.se/user/tpb_4_ever/

Over 35 GB of content compressed to under 8 GB.

============================================================

How to install
------------------------------------------------------------

Prerequisites:
* 7zip or WinRAR (64-bit recommended).
* At least 1GB of free RAM.

Procedure:
1: Open Game.7z and extract the contents to where you want
	them, you need at least 36 GB of free space.
2: Open the GreenLuma dir and run GreenLuma.exe, choose
	offline mode and then select Train Simulator 2013 from
	the Steam game list.
3: Play!

============================================================

Check me out on YouTube: http://yt.pyronexus.com
